system.effect: A Horde of Many Creatures: has Horde Magnitude and singular Armour Value instead of wounds. Have a size dependant on Magnitude: 30, Massive(+30). 60, Immense(+40). 90, Monumental(+50), 120, Titanic(+60). Hordes don't normally Dodge/Parry. Each Attack that deals damage against a horde reduces its magnitude by 1,  +1 for Power Weapons, or X for Blast Weapons and Range/10 + 1d5 for Spray Weapons. Other effects such as nondamaging psychic powers are GM dependant. If a Horde is reduced by 25% in a turn it tests Willpower or breaks, if reduced bellow 50% it has -10 to WIllpower, and at below 25% it breaks. When attacking, Hordes melee attack all nearby, or make Magnitude/10 Ranged attacks. Hordes cannot aim, run out of ammo, or Jam weapons, their attacks cannot be dodged or parried and deals + Magnitude/10 d10 damage (max 2d10). Some exceptions may exist such as if a single horde member has a specific weapon. Hordes cannot inflict Righeous Fury/Zealous Hatred unless specified otherwise.
